children.subject: Very early this week (labs begin on wednesday!)
Thanks! After they are released, how long do selected applicants have to accept or deny the offer?
Those who are accepted will get those details in the email, but it is a quick turnaround so we can finalize everything before labs.
When are decisions expected to be released?
Yes. If you have not been contacted through data8@berkeley.edu, then unfortunately you have not been selected to be an AI for this semester.

history.content:
Hi everyone!

We’re looking for students at UC Berkeley who are passionate about data science to be Academic Interns for Data 8 and Data 100 for Fall 2021! If you are interested and have taken Data 8 and/or Data 100 and received a B or better (or a P for all semesters in 2020, Spring 2021, or Summer 2021), please consider applying!

Serving as an Academic Intern is a great way to help current students achieve mastery and have a good experience in Data 8 and Data 100. It is also a great way to prepare for becoming a tutor or UGSI in the future!

RESPONSIBILITIES
All Academic Interns enroll in a mandatory 1-unit P/NP class offered by the course faculty. This corresponds to five hours of time commitment per week.

For Data 8, the typical weekly breakdown is:
- 1 hour of preparation (e.g. studying the week’s assignments, consulting with senior staff, etc.)
- 2 hours of assisting students

For Data 100, the typical weekly breakdown is:

- 1 hour of preparation (e.g. studying the week’s assignments, consulting with senior staff, etc.)
- 1 hour of assisting students
- 1 hour for pedagogy practice, (U)GSI check-ins, AI team meetings, etc

APPLICATION DEADLINE: Friday, 8/27 at 11:59pm PDT

Data 8 Application: https://forms.gle/kRfHsTpegV5RxCpZ8 

Data 100 Application: https://forms.gle/u7WmZRkGTyWvk2we6


If you have any questions, feel free to send them to marmis@berkeley.edu (for Data 8) and parthbaokar@berkeley.edu (for Data 100) :)
